name: qorder-pos-system
description: QOrder POS System - Complete Point of Sale Solution

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.deploy:cpanel: npm run build:all && echo 'Build completed. Ready for cPanel deployment.'
